<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ghoran Weapon Familiarity](/Feats.aspx?ID=3947) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ghoran" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=352" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 37</row>

</column>

---

Over the course of your long, long existence, you've had a chance to practice with traditional ghoran weapons. You're trained with the [glaive](/Weapons.aspx?ID=20), [greatclub](/Weapons.aspx?ID=22), [hatchet](/Weapons.aspx?ID=27), [scythe](/Weapons.aspx?ID=39), and [sickle](/Weapons.aspx?ID=9). In addition, you gain access to all uncommon [ghoran](/Traits.aspx?ID=352) weapons. For the purpose of determining your proficiency, martial ghoran weapons are simple weapons and advanced ghoran weapons are martial weapons.

<title level="2">Ghoran Weapon Familiarity leads to...</title>
[Ghoran Weapon Expertise](/Feats.aspx?ID=3958), [Ghoran Weapon Practice](/Feats.aspx?ID=3949)
name: Ghoran Weapon Familiarity
